revision.text:
{{Doomwiki}}
'''Risen3D''' is a [[source port]] based on [[Doomsday]] maintained by Graham Jackson. While support of non-Doom games has not been kept in this fork, additional features (such as [[Boom]] and [[MBF]] compatibility) have been included. The [[MUSINFO]] lump originates from this port.
== External links == *[http://risen3d.drdteam.org/ Risen3D home page]
[[category:Non-ZDoom source ports]]
